casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 7, 2014

[Cite as 0410712014 Case Announcements, 2014-Ohio-1466.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2013-0579. In re D.M.

Hamilton App. No. C-120794, 2013-Ohio-668. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Hamilton County.

Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of further proceedings in the juvenile court, it is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.

Kennedy, J., dissents.
